title: BookNoteHub
description: A web app to track and manage non-fiction books with notes, ratings, and reading history using PostgreSQL database.

title: DeCodeX
description: A modern coding platform built with React and AI APIs, providing real-time solutions with a smooth developer experience.

title: AI Voice Agent
description: An AI-powered voice agent using Murf AI API with Python for backend data handling, integrated with Pandas libraries and a frontend built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Blog Platform
description: A blogging web application for creating, editing, and managing blog posts with dynamic rendering using EJS templates.

title: Fanta Product Sale Website
description: An interactive e-commerce style website for Fanta product showcase with dynamic data loading using JSON.
